Middle	0
age	0
and	0
the	0
changes	0
it	0

like	0
a	0

door	0
.	0

go	0
through	0
it	0
,	0

wiser	0
and	0
losing	0
their	0
rough	0

.	0

minority	0

whether	0
to	0

.	0

age	0

age	0
,	0
those	2
years	3
between	3

and	3

is	0
both	0

.	0
